name: Claude Projects
purpose: Organize AI workflows with custom knowledge, instructions, and team collaboration
description: Claude Projects is a feature within Claude that allows users to create dedicated workspaces with custom knowledge bases, specific instructions, and conversation history. Each project can have up to 200,000 tokens of context (knowledge docs, style guides, code repos), custom instructions for behavior, and shared team access. Used for organizing complex workflows, maintaining context across sessions, and collaborating on AI-assisted tasks with consistent behavior.
cost_structure: Included with Claude Pro subscription ($20/month) and Team plans

use_cases: maintain custom knowledge base per project
collaborate on AI tasks with team

typical_workflow_pattern.task: Extract Meeting Insights with Claude Projects
steps: Upload knowledge docs (meeting formats, action item templates)
Set custom instructions (extract action items, format as markdown)
Ask Claude to extract insights following project instructions
Claude uses project context to format consistently
Share project with team for collaboration
typical_workflow_pattern.time_estimate: 5-10 minutes for setup, 2-3 minutes per transcript analysis
typical_workflow_pattern.time_saved: 30+ minutes per meeting (vs manual note-taking and formatting)

limitations: Requires Claude Pro or Team subscription

key_features.custom_knowledge: Upload docs, style guides, code repos (up to 200K tokens)
key_features.custom_instructions: Define AI behavior, output format, role

use_case_examples.description: Create project with meeting format templates, upload transcripts, extract action items with consistent formatting
Upload code style guide, set instructions for coding standards, generate code following project conventions
Upload brand guidelines, tone of voice docs, generate content matching brand style

recommended_for: Organizing complex AI workflows, maintaining project context, and team collaboration on AI tasks
